14662884:
'''Khun Phiphit Wathi''' ({{lang-th|ขุนพิพิธวาที}}, ?-?), hay '''Luang Phiphit''' ({{lang|th|หลวงพิพิธ}})<ref>{{chú thích sách|url=https://books.google.com/books?id=owdgDwAAQBAJ&pg=PT264&dq=%E0%B8%AB%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%9E%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%9E%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%98+Tran+lien&hl=en&sa=X&ved=0ahUKEwjvxYGK8eTfAhW3IDQIHVQ_ACIQuwUIMDAA#v=onepage&q=%E0%B8%AB%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%9E%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%9E%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%98%20Tran%20lien&f=false|title=การเมืองไทยสมัยพระเจ้ากรุงธนบุรี พ.11|author=นิธิ เอียวศรีวงศ์|publisher=Matichon Public Company Limited|year=2004|isbn=9789743230561|language=th|page=248}}</ref>, '''Phraya Phiphit''' ({{lang|th|พระยาพิพิธ}})<ref name="Emergence"/>, tên cá nhân là '''Chiam''' ({{lang|th|เจียม}})<ref name="Ayutthaya"/>, là một [[cướp biển]] [[người Hoa]], sau này là một tướng của [[vương triều Thonburi]], [[Xiêm La]] ([[Thái Lan]]).

Có gốc [[Triều Châu]] từ tỉnh [[Quảng Đông]], [[Trung Quốc]],<ref name="Emergence">[http://www.rianthaijournal.org/wp-content/uploads/2009/06/Jirathorn-Chartsiri.pdf The Emergence of the Kingdom of Thonburi in the Context of the Chinese Era 1727-1782] {{Webarchive|url=https://web.archive.org/web/20181205193417/http://www.rianthaijournal.org/wp-content/uploads/2009/06/Jirathorn-Chartsiri.pdf |date=2018-12-05 }}, p. 19</ref> tên tiếng Trung là '''Trần Liên''' (陳聯) và '''Trần Thái''' (陳太).<ref name="Ayutthaya">{{chú thích sách|title=From Japan to Arabia: Ayutthaya's maritime relations with Asia|author=Bhumibol Adulyadej (King of Thailand)|publisher=Toyota Thailand Foundation|year=1999|isbn=9789748718385|language=en|page=189}}</ref>
